name: stock_get_histories
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ms_finance.
Tool description: This API helps to query financial summary, stocks, quotes, movers, news, etc... to create a site/application such as morningstar.com
API description: Fetches historical stock market data for a given performance ID.

performanceid.description: The PerformanceId field retrieved from the /market/auto-complete or /market/get-summary APIs.
